topic: How to combine pstats with typing for production code (Python 3.12+)
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to combine pstats with typing for production code (Python 3.12+)

response_parsed.title: Combining pstats and Type Hints for Production Code in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to leverage the power of pstats profiling tool along with type hinting features introduced in Python 3.12 to optimize production code.
key_points: Use pstats for profiling Python code at runtime
Leverage new Type Hinting features in Python 3.12 for cleaner and more expressive code
Improve the maintainability of optimized production code
version_notes: Compatible with future Type Hinting features and improvements
caveats: Profile functions with a significant runtime to yield meaningful results
Customize the profiler output based on specific project needs
